title: Cant Launch the game and cant submit a ticket for it
body:
I tried to submit a ticket after exhausting the methods provided but each time I'd click submit, the page would refresh, stay on the same page and nothing would come up in 'my tickets'. Not entirely sure what to do after that fails too, hence I've made this post.
The issue I was making a ticket for was that after the latest windows update the game wont launch after champ select, I've tried force re-patching, reinstalling, getting permissions, turning off my firewall, turning off other background applications and checked for corrupted files.
 Obviously this is a super common issue, I've seen countless posts about it and I've tried a number of solutions, at this point I'm hoping a support member might see this but if not should I try making a ticket under a different type of issue and explain why it has the wrong type? Was it just the 'tech issues' page that is busted?

replies.body: Just in case if you have bitdefender installed it has a new update which stops league matches from launching. Just disable Advanced Threat Defense and your client should launch the game after champ select.

Not sure if I can help with the game side fo things (other than making sure your GPU drivers are up to date), but for the ticket side, try a different browser and/or clearing the cache of your current one.
tried it on internet explorer and it went through, thanks for that
